product.title: YUNYI 3-in-1 Hot Air Styler And Rotating Hair Dryer For Dry Hair, Curl Hair, Straighten Hair
product.title_excluding_brand: 3-in-1 Hot Air Styler And Rotating Hair Dryer For Dry Hair, Curl Hair, Straighten Hair
product.description: Features1. Three In One Hot Air Styling Device And Rotary Hair Dryer: It is equipped with two interchangeable rotary brushes, providing you with a variety of styling options. A larger brush barrel is perfect for thick hair, providing volume and smoothness. The smaller lens tube is perfect for soft and casual hair, making you look more relaxed and natural.2. 3rd Gear Setting: This hot air brush shaper and dryer offer three temperature settings - hot, warm, and cold - to meet the needs of different hairstyles. The rotating mechanism of the hair dryer brush supports two directions of rotation, providing a large number of curling movements, helping you easily create a natural curling effect.3. Nourishing And Reducing Damage: This rotary hair brush is made of an environmentally friendly alloy and can serve as a thermal conductor. It releases negative ions, helping to moisturize and nourish hair, making it soft, smooth, and shiny. The hair stick also provides a uniform heat distribution, reducing the damage caused by overheating to the hair.4. 360 Rotation And Adjustable Hairline: The brush head rotates 360 , allowing you to design your hairstyle from any angle and enjoy flexibility. The hot air brush also has an adjustable power cord that can rotate 360 , ensuring safer and more convenient use when styling at home.5. Create Beautiful Hair: With this hot air brush shaper and dryer, you can comfortably achieve professional salon effects at home. Whether you want to create fluffy curls, smooth straight hair, or add some elasticity and shine to your hair, this hot air brush is your secret weapon for creating salon grade hair.SpecificationMaterial: ptcSpecifications: US-220V, EU-110VColor: RedSize: 39 x 10 x 8 cmWeight: 617 g

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
